Well Taliyah's short story takes place BEFORE we knew of Yasuo today. Like for instance the fact that only when gifted the thread by Taliyah did Yasuo actually tie his hair up. Same could be said about his nose and lack of scar.

Was refering to the shape of it.

He looks like a different person in Yasuo's clothing, (among other things) due to the nose being changed so much.

Unless he got a nosejob between then and now, it seems weird.
He had to hide his identity, duh.

{{champion:254}}
It got drawn by a different artist than the one who did his splash.
ah, that would do it.
Maybe he's older now
idk why he looks like hes 60

Well it has been a few years since he came out
He's probably gotten older
its a prequel.

I knew there was something wrong!
I kept thinking it was the beard.
The smell of shekels
they fucking killed the art, his nose is so fucked up

Yasuo is 28 *at the oldest.* Why does he look 42 in that art? 

Why are his eyebrows so bushy? They're supposed to be long and straight.

Why is the tip of his nose so much deeper? It's supposed to be straight and slightly pointing forward at the end.

Why does he look so much more Asian overall? As an Asian character, he only looks slightly Asian. So why did the artist go overboard on Asian facial features? Does the artist know who Yasuo is? Did the artist AT LEAST look at what he actually looks like before drawing this false version of him? Why did this get OK'd? Does this prove that QA doesn't actually care about their job? Is there even QA for art?

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Ykxq7MvBOII/maxresdefault.jpg
Such an awful splash
